alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross; Mississippi; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:47PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Francis, southwestern Mississippi, Crittenden, eastern Cross, southwestern Tipton and western Shelby Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 646 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jericho, or 10 miles west of Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Memphis, Marion, Earle, Parkin, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Memphis, Crawfordsville, Edmondson, Sunset, Gilmore, Anthonyville, Jericho, Jennette, Simsboro, Frayser, Downtown Memphis, Crittenden, Turrell, Clarkedale and Birdsong. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
